articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: Sunil Chhetri only known face in 17-member Indian football team for Asian Games, Igor Stimac’s status not known - The Indian Express
articles.description: India will face China in their first game on September 19 followed by games against Bangladesh (September 21) and Myanmar (September 24).
articles.content: Indian national team skipper Sunil Chhetri will lead a 17-member squad at the Hangzhou Asian Games with only nine of the 22 players initially requested by coach Igor Stimac released by Indian Super L… [+4067 chars]
